DOC.detailed_description: Outcome measure involve compare right eye leave eye severity 12 different symptom , record severity 1-5 scale . A score 1 mean symptoms 5 mean severe . The 12 measurement include sharp pain , dull ache , pain movement , sting sensation , itching , light sensitivity , watery eye , dry eye , sandy sensation , pressure sensation , decrease vision , blurry vision .
